title: Take control of your data

actions.title: Access your data

actions.title: Erase your data
actions.description: We will erase all of your personal data. This action cannot be undone.

button.description: Manage your consent preferences, including the option to select 'Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information'.
description_subtext: In order to opt-out of certain consent preferences, we may need to identify your account via your email address. This is optional.
